channel.title: Connector 365 Apps on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Connector 365 Apps on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: CTI for STARFACE
item.description: Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE Online Help Here you will find all help and learning resources, for our Connector 365 CTI for STARFACE App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.

item.title: E-POST
item.description: Connector 365 E-POST Online Help Here you will find all help and learning resources, for our Connector 365 E-POST App*. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page. *The Connector 365 E-POST App is powered by the E-POSTBUSINESS API, a service of the Deutsche Post
